function.name: run_make
function.description: Execute a predefined make target. Only targets defined in the root Makefile are allowed. You cannot run arbitrary shell commands.

function.name: jules
function.description: Interact with the Jules AI agent for complex coding tasks, PR reviews, or repository-wide changes.

action.description: The action to perform with Jules.

prompt.description: The instruction or message for Jules (used with create, send-message).

repo.description: The GitHub repository name (owner/repo) for the session.

sessionId.description: The ID of an existing Jules session.

extraArgs.description: Any additional flags or arguments for the jules client.

function.name: write_note
function.description: Save a new note to the memory directory as a Markdown file.

filename.description: The name of the file (e.g., report.md).

content.description: The content of the note in Markdown format.
